Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Do some of you play Crysis and/or mod for it?

For everyone who knows Cryengine 2 and it\'s possibilities I might have something interesting.

A active Crysis 1 modder, Chris, has been working on a a awesome flyable aircraft mod for Cryengine 2.

He also made a map generation tool named Automap (with working trains!! ) and he is now starting a an other project...

He is going to build a spacecraft simulation in Crysis! 8)

Of course it will be very different than KSP, but it still is awesome!

You can find information about it here in the Flyable aircraft mod: http://www.crydev.net/viewtopic.php?f=280&t=25876

The topic is about the Flyable aircraft, on page 79 he announces the spacecraft mod.

The real developing starts around here (first pic): http://www.crydev.net/viewtopic.php?p=898175#p898175

Idk if I am allowed to post it in off-topic because this is a other game... so if I am doing it wrong then please let me know.

All the best,

Blinkin

I love playing around the cryengine 2 map maker that comes with crysis ( only real reason why i bought it ) and i tried some mods here and there but none were my favorite and mostly download new maps not new mods

Lol I bought it for the same reason. xD

It\'s very amusing to fiddle around with all those maps.

I also love Xigmatek\'s work with his particles. They are amazing!
